Speaking during a visit to Scotland shortly after Andy Coulson 's announcement, the Labour leader said the resignation raised questions about David Cameron 's judgment. "He's now done the right thing," Ed Miliband said. I think there are questions about David Cameron 's judgment about hanging on to him as long as he did. Labour, which had been expecting Andy Coulson to resign for weeks, had long planned to turn his resignation into an issue about David Cameron 's judgment. Simon& Schuster publisher Jonathan Karp even went so far as to email a group of journalists and Washington insiders asking them to refrain from commenting on the book, in solidarity with the principle that a book should be judged on its content and not on the perceived ideology of its author. Eric Martin and Stephen Elliott have no such qualms about anonymity. Next month the pair will publish the novel Donald Rumsfeld the same day former John McCain secretary of defense Donald Rumsfeld publishes his memoirs Known and Unknown. Whereas
